attributes.action: Enforce the immigration act and detain all suspected illegal immigrants and asylum seekers until their legal staus can be established.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If anyone is suspected of attempting to enter the UK illegally or on the grounds of seeking asylum, they should be detained until their status is established. If found guilty, they should be charged with the offence or deported. People allowed into the UK after this procedure should undergo a probation period to ensure that they do not pose a threat or unreasonable burden to UK citizens or institutions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
